sqlMap.select:
select b.name NAME, a.contract_id CONTRACTID, a.version VERSION, a.contract_version_id VERSIONID, c.con_type CONTYPE, c.REQ_RSP, c.tcp_ctr_f_id TCPCTRFID from CONTRACT_VERSION a, CONTRACT b, contract_format c where a.contract_id = b.contract_id and c.contract_version_id = a.contract_version_id and b.state = 'A' and a.tenant_id=#tenantId# and b.tenant_id=#tenantId# and c.tenant_id=#tenantId#
a.version like CONCAT('%',#contractVersion#,'%') b.name like CONCAT('%',#contractName#,'%')
c.tcp_ctr_f_id not in
#inArray[]#
c.con_type = #contractType#
UPPER(c.REQ_RSP) = UPPER(#httpType#)
order by a.contract_id desc LIMIT #startPage_mysql#,#endPage_mysql#

select count(*) from CONTRACT_VERSION a, CONTRACT b, contract_format c where a.contract_id = b.contract_id and c.contract_version_id = a.contract_version_id and b.state = 'A' and a.tenant_id=#tenantId# and b.tenant_id=#tenantId# and c.tenant_id=#tenantId#
a.version like CONCAT('%',#contractVersion#,'%') b.name like CONCAT('%',#contractName#,'%')
c.tcp_ctr_f_id not in
#inArray[]#
c.con_type = #contractType#
UPPER(c.REQ_RSP) = UPPER(#httpType#)
SELECT nextval('SEQ_CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT') FROM DUAL
sqlMap.insert:
insert into CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT ( CREATE_DATE,CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT_CODE
CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT_ID
CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID
ENDPOINT_ID CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID
ACTION_TYPE TENANT_ID
) values(utc_timestamp(),uuid()
#conAdaEndId# #contractAdapterId#
#endPointId# #srcTcpCtrFId# #actionType# #tenantId#
)
sqlMap.update: update CONTRACT_ADAPTER set SRC_CTR_F_ID=0 where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID=#contractAdapterId# and SRC_CTR_F_ID=#tcpCrtFId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
sqlMap.delete: delete from CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID=#contractAdapterId# and CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID=#tcpCrtFId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
sqlMap.select: select SRC_CTR_F_ID from CONTRACT_ADAPTER where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #pageContractAdapterId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
select count(*) from CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #pageContractAdapterId# and ACTION_TYPE = 'R' and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

select count(*) from NODE_DESC_MAPER where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and ACTION_TYPE_CD = #operator# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
TAR_NODE_DESC_ID = #tarNodeDescId#
SRC_NODE_DESC_ID = #srcNodeDescId#
select CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID from CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
select TCP_CTR_F_ID from NODE_DESC where NODE_DESC_ID = #srcNodeDescId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
select * from NODE_DESC_MAPER where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and TAR_NODE_DESC_ID = #tarNodeDescId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
select count(*) from CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID = #srcTcpCtrFId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
sqlMap.update: update CONTRACT_ADAPTER set SRC_CTR_F_ID=#srcTcpCtrFId# where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID=#contractAdapterId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
update CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT set ACTION_TYPE = #actionType# where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID = #srcTcpCtrFId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
sqlMap.select: select SRC_CTR_F_ID from CONTRACT_ADAPTER where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
select * from NODE_VAL_ADAPTER_REQ where NODE_DESC_ID = #tarNodeDescId# and CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId#
select count(*) from NODE_VAL_ADAPTER_REQ where NODE_DESC_ID = #nodeDescId# and CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID =#contractAdapterId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

select * from VARIABLE_MAP where STATE = 'A' and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
CONS_MAP_CD = #consMapCD#
order by VAR_MAPING_ID desc LIMIT #startPage_mysql#,#endPage_mysql#

select count(*) from VARIABLE_MAP where STATE = 'A' and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
CONS_MAP_CD = #consMapCD#
select NAME from VAR_MAP_TYPE where CONS_MAP_CD = #consMapCD#
sqlMap.delete: delete from CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID=#pageContractAdapterId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
sqlMap.select: select cai.SRC_CTR_F_ID SRCCTRFID,cai.TAR_CTR_F_ID TARCTRID,cf.CON_TYPE srcType,cf2.CON_TYPE tarType from CONTRACT_ADAPTER cai left join CONTRACT_FORMAT cf on cf.TCP_CTR_F_ID = cai.SRC_CTR_F_ID and cf.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# left join CONTRACT_FORMAT cf2 on cf2.TCP_CTR_F_ID = cai.TAR_CTR_F_ID and cf2.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# where cai.CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #pageContractAdapterId# and cai.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

select cae.CONTRACT_FORMATE_id,cae.ACTION_TYPE,cf.CON_TYPE from CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT cae left join CONTRACT_FORMAT cf on cf.TCP_CTR_F_ID = cae.CONTRACT_FORMATE_id and cf.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# where cae.CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #pageContractAdapterId# and cae.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

select con.NAME from CONTRACT con left join CONTRACT_VERSION cv on cv.CONTRACT_ID = con.CONTRACT_ID and cv.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# left join CONTRACT_FORMAT cf on cf.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = cv.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID and cf.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# where cf.TCP_CTR_F_ID = #contractFormateId# and con.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

select ndm.SRC_NODE_DESC_ID,ndm.TAR_NODE_DESC_ID,ndm.ACTION_TYPE_CD ,nd.TCP_CTR_F_ID srcTcpId,nd2.TCP_CTR_F_ID tarTcpId from NODE_DESC_MAPER ndm left join NODE_DESC nd on nd.NODE_DESC_ID = ndm.SRC_NODE_DESC_ID and nd.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# left join NODE_DESC nd2 on nd2.NODE_DESC_ID = ndm.TAR_NODE_DESC_ID and nd2.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# where ndm.CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #pageContractAdapterId# and ndm.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
select * from CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID = #contractFormatId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
sqlMap.update: update CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT set ENDPOINT_ID=#endPointId# where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID=#contractAdapterId# and CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID=#contractFormatId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
sqlMap.select: select ACTION_TYPE from CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID= #contractAdapterId# and CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID = #contractFormatId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

select VAR_MAP_TYPE_ID,CONS_MAP_CD,NAME from VAR_MAP_TYPE where state='A' and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
CONS_MAP_CD like CONCAT('%',#consMapCD#,'%') NAME like CONCAT('%',#consMapName#,'%')
order by VAR_MAP_TYPE_ID desc LIMIT #startPage_mysql#,#endPage_mysql#

select ndm.SRC_NODE_DESC_ID,nd.NODE_NAME as SRC_NODE_NAME,nd.NODE_PATH as SRC_NODE_PATH, ndm.TAR_NODE_DESC_ID,nd2.NODE_NAME as TAR_NODE_NAME,nd2.NODE_PATH as TAR_NODE_PATH, v.VALUE_EXPRESS,ndm.ACTION_TYPE_CD from NODE_DESC_MAPER ndm left join NODE_DESC nd on nd.NODE_DESC_ID = ndm.SRC_NODE_DESC_ID and nd.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# left join NODE_DESC nd2 on nd2.NODE_DESC_ID = ndm.TAR_NODE_DESC_ID and nd2.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# left join NODE_VAL_ADAPTER_REQ v on v.NODE_DESC_ID = ndm.SRC_NODE_DESC_ID and v.STATE='A' and v.CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID=#contractAdapterId# and v.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# where ndm.ACTION_TYPE_CD='H' and ndm.CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and ndm.TAR_NODE_DESC_ID = #tarNodeDescId# and ndm.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# order by ndm.NODE_DESC_MAPER_ID desc

select count(*) from VAR_MAP_TYPE where state='A' and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
CONS_MAP_CD like CONCAT('%',#consMapCD#,'%') NAME like CONCAT('%',#consMapName#,'%')
order by VAR_MAP_TYPE_ID desc
sqlMap.delete: delete from VAR_MAP_TYPE where VAR_MAP_TYPE_ID = #varMapTypeId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
